title: got banned from all-chat
body:
Just curious how long itll be until i can talk in all chat again. I had one bad game where my team was literal trash and i just couldnt stand it anymore. they reported me, and i got banned from all-chat.

how long until i can talk again?

replies.body: You're probably better off not talking in all chat at all. All chat is useless and if you're not good on controlling yourself it will probably just get you in trouble.
10 games if this was the first time you've been restricted in the last few months, or 25 if it was the second time.

first time in over a year ive had any time of issue. was just a really bad game honestly lol

thanks
